Reviews.Title: “deceitful practices”
Reviews.Author: Paul S
Reviews.Content: I can not recommend you to choose this hotel. I have very bad experience with the staff. Actually they stole my money via their deceitful practises. Paul, Hamburg

Reviews.Title: “Nice and Clean”
Reviews.Author: joshjoy
Reviews.Content: We will stay in a two beds room for a weekend and I will enjoy it a lot. The location is perfect, right at a centre near Vatican (about 10 minutes walk). We stay at the luxury floor, that is the name of the floor at other building across the street where Vatican Garden inn has another rooms. Room has been clean, new, with free wifi, plasma tv and comfortable beds. Bathroom has been new and clean, there is everyday cleaning by the hotel stuff. Breakfast in hotel is pretty good but there is not many chances to choose between food. There is only cereals, some toasts, coffe and nothing else. Near the hotel is a few good restaurants for lunch and dinner. During the stay there is no problems, we make payment by credit cart with no problems and also the stuff was very kind. So I can definitely recommend this hotel because you get very good value for good money :)

Reviews.Title: “Goog hotel nice location bu trude and arrogant manager”
Reviews.Author: Sidihmed A
Reviews.Content: The hotel was nice our room was very specious and clean, Bathroom was decent even though had issues like water leaks etc.. Breakfast was decent, nothing too special, best about this hotel it has pretty good location, nice walking distance from all amities, if you can handle 20 to 30 min walk Both guys in the reception were polite and try to help at their best ability but I believe the hotel own was rude and arrogant person, expect us to fully pay our stay on the 1st date.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant Hotel”
Reviews.Author: brian1991
Reviews.Content: We came to Rome for our holidays and were pleasantly suprised by the hotel we had booked. The staff was very friendly and answered all our questions. The location is excellent as it is just a five minute walk away from the Vatican and very close to many of Romes attractions. The rooms were also very nice. All in all a brilliant hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Safe Location, Terrible Management”
Reviews.Author: razpop
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Vatican Garden Inn for a few days while in Rome. The room was charming, in a good location, with a balcony overlooking a small street. The bathrooms, however were quite small and in need of repair. Our shower head shot water all over the bathroom and when we called maintenance to fix it, they simply loosened a bolt in the shower head, fixing the uncontrollable spray, but providing zero water pressure. We also had a problem with the hair dryer falling off of the wall, and unfortunately our room had no back-up hair dryer. Although they advertise Wi-Fi, we were unable to pick up a connection in the room. The only area that I found connection was the check-in/breakfast area, a few blocks away from our room. One evening we came home to an obnoxious alarm going off. When we called the front desk, no one was there, as they had left for the evening, so we were forced to deal with a loud alarm until it shut itself off a few hours later. There was 1 staff member that we saw in the 3 days that we stayed at the Vatican Gardens Inn. I felt quite bad for him as he tried his best to accommodate us, but 1 person isn't capable of tending to new guests, checking out guests that are leaving, preparing breakfast each day, tending to the grounds, and helping people with room problems. Overall, I wouldn't recommend staying at the Vatican Gardens Inn unless you're only planning on staying there to sleep and not shower.

Reviews.Title: “Great place with english speaking staff & awesome breakfast”
Reviews.Author: LeeJon13
Reviews.Content: The decor & the rooms are very nice, and the location is very close to the Vatican. We strolled from here through Rome, but I guess it is long even though the walk is usually described as 30-40 min to Historical Rome. but, one can always use the metro with the Roma Pass and it makes movement very easy. Their breakfast was really good and filling. The front office staff spoke excellent English.

Reviews.Title: “Great location our room very small, bathroom needs refitting”
Reviews.Author: peterlynn
Reviews.Content: The breakfast is continental not American as stated no guest lounge, breakfast is served in the garden in a gazzebo with plastic sides not good for the winter. Our room was clean but small had to walk side way to get passed bottom of bed, bathroom very small shower falling of wall hair drier broken ( spare hair drier in draw ) and in need of deep clean.

Reviews.Title: “VERY NICE”
Reviews.Author: DRMOLOKAI
Reviews.Content: big room -----free wifi----4 blocks from vatican--good breakfast---nice people good value

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: Dennisasd
Reviews.Content: this hotel does not know in what business they are in!!!!! breakfast is outside and very poor and bad service. Tipical italian, no service and high rates. booked in advance and we were placed in a sort appartment building across the street. Airco making noise in the night and promissed to switch rooms was never done after therr days of complaining and sleeping in another hotel for one night i got my switch of room. terrible. Go to a NH hotel nearby, that one is better. Go for a european brand hotel and not the local ones!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Never use hotel again”
Reviews.Author: paper1000
Reviews.Content: Booked hotel one and half months in advance for four single rooms. Arrived reception said water damage in all four rooms and we can stay in another premises which was bascially an apartment. Person here wanted cash. I totally refused and left and slept rough in airport. I have to say this hotel wrecked our weekend. I would never stay their and recommend no one to stay their as the owner/manager/hotel i found to be pure liars. Some one should take a legal case against them for the cons they are. It would put me off to going to rome again. I am not suprised other people had booking problems here

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location.”
Reviews.Author: Manysha
Reviews.Content: Very quiet and clean hotel, nice stuff, perfect location - 2 metro stations nearby and 8 min by foot to the Vatican.

Reviews.Title: “Not at all bad”
Reviews.Author: cred68
Reviews.Content: I booked two rooms(one double and one single)direct at Beldes Guest House Hotel from Sep 25 to 29th 2008 and we payed 960,00 euros for them but when we arrived at Beldes the reception sent us to the Vatican Garden Inn because the Beldes was completely full(don´t trust this hotel.You book there and stay at another place!!!!). The hotel is well decorated, well located(10 minutes walking to Vatican City) but our room and our bathroom was very small. Breakfast was a joke. In the morning, the receptionist girl was very rude ( no good mornings, no smiles, no answers) and she was responsable for the breakfast. Everyday there was something missing but our last day missed everything as juice, yougurt, milk, bread, etc, etc and the girl was so rude that all the guests felt afraid to ask her anything. So, It´s a very expensive hotel considering what it offers. Try to find another one.

Reviews.Title: “uncomfortable services, all very very small , rooms, parking, reception 2 sqm.,”
Reviews.Author: MONTESXX
Reviews.Content: Attention : rooms , baths very nice calssic decoration and new, but too small, bathrooms appx 1 sq. meter!!, and watch out some rooms are 200 mts away from hotel in other building...don't accept as very uncomfortable to have room in 1 place and hotel reception, breakfast ecc... in other place!!! watch out breakfast is served in an outside tent in court yard with poor quality products and freezing (at least in january!)!!.. stay in another place!!!! there are another 200 hotels in central rome for same price!!!

Reviews.Title: “Be Wary”
Reviews.Author: LeilaSmithUK
Reviews.Content: We stayed for almost one week and booked one double rooms and one triple room. Our stay was okay but there were some major problems with the booking, compounded by the fact that the manager pretended that she was just another member of staff and so unable to help us. Intially we were placed into two triple rooms as the rooms we had requested together could not be supplied. We were content to occupy these rooms ( and pay the extra) but at the managers request moved to two double rooms with the agreement that our booking ( and bill) would be changed to two double rooms. Two nights in we were moved room again (as an arriving guest had requested one of the rooms we occupied). I will only mention the discourtesy of the hotel in moving us from the room in preference of a guest who had not yet arrived. The hotel did not book specific room numbers so this really was very poor customer service. We then spent two nights in a double room beside major buildign work and had a very disturbed rest. At the end of it all we were charged for a double and a triple room even though at the managers request we had only occupied this booking for one night (the rest of the time we were in two double rooms). The woman who dealt with us (whom we later discovered to be the manager) avoided all debate by pretending to be following the orders of another. A nice place to stay but be warned that if you have any problems, management won't take responsibility or even identify themselves.

Reviews.Title: “Vatican Garden Insult”
Reviews.Author: nobsdad
Reviews.Content: The staff of this hotel booked 24 members of our family and the hotel only holds 15 people by Italian law. There were another 8 people staying there. After the second night of 4 adults crammed into a double room we found another hotel. We checked out and were forced to pay for the nights we did not stay there. The staff was the most discourteous we have encountered in our 10 years of traveling to Italy. They also insisted on my handicapped 87 year old fater in law pay for his room when he had to leave with my wife and I. There are also several safey issues , the worst being an electrical outlet hanging out of the wall waiting to electruit a small child!

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms but staff is a little disorganized”
Reviews.Author: ReviewerSeattle
Reviews.Content: The location was great. Short walk to St. Peter's, a Metro stop, shopping, and restaurants. The rooms were very nice and extremely quiet. However, the staff seems a little disorganized. Although the buffet breakfast was posted to begin at 7:30, the few times our schedule dictated a 7:30 breakfast, it wasn't ready nor was anyone around to ask about it. We were moved mid-stay to a different room which was kind of irritating since we weren't warned when we checked in that this was going to happen. These are far from major inconveniences but weren't what we experienced in other 3-star hotels we stayed in during our vacation.

HotelInfo.Name: Vatican Garden Inn
HotelInfo.Address: Via Germanico 201, 00192 Rome, Italy
